mapper.select:
SELECT num, subject, hitCount, reg_date,
FROM member m JOIN bbs b ON m.userId = b.userId JOIN study_board sb ON m.userId = sb.userId JOIN qna q ON m.userId = q.userId WHERE
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM member m JOIN bbs b ON m.userId = b.userId JOIN study_board sb ON m.userId = sb.userId JOIN qna q ON m.userId = q.userId
